tests.name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
tests.description: Measures red/white blood cells and platelets to assess general health.

tests.name: Fasting Blood Sugar (FBS)
tests.description: Measures blood glucose after fasting to screen for diabetes.

tests.name: Lipid Profile
tests.description: Measures cholesterol fractions and triglycerides for heart risk assessment.

tests.name: Urinalysis (Routine)
tests.description: Analyzes urine for infection, glucose, protein and general health status.

tests.name: Urea, Electrolytes & Creatinine (UEC)
tests.description: Assesses kidney function and electrolyte balance.

tests.name: HbA1c
tests.description: Gives average blood glucose levels over the last 2-3 months.

tests.name: Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH)
tests.description: Screening test for thyroid gland activity and hormonal balance.

tests.name: Liver Function Tests (LFT)
tests.description: Series of chemistry tests to check liver health and enzyme levels.

tests.name: Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR)
tests.description: Measures how quickly red blood cells settle; marker of inflammation.

tests.name: Vitamin D (25-OH)
tests.description: Measures level of vitamin D, important for bone health and immunity.

tests.name: Home Sample - Diabetes Screening Package
tests.description: Home-visit for sample collection and screening for diabetes markers.

tests.name: Home Sample - Full Health Check Basic
tests.description: Basic health screening with home sample collection and reporting.

tests.name: Home Sample - Kidney Profile
tests.description: Kidney function panel collected at home for convenience of patient.

tests.name: Home Sample - Hormonal Panel
tests.description: Hormone testing package collected at home (thyroid, prolactin etc.).

tests.name: Home Sample - Women Wellness Basic
tests.description: Home-collected sample for basic women's wellness check including hormones.

tests.name: Home Sample - Full Heart Risk Profile
tests.description: Comprehensive cardiac risk screening collected from home for patient convenience.

tests.name: Home Sample - Infectious Disease Screen
tests.description: Home-visit collection for a set of infectious disease markers (Hepatitis, HIV etc.).

tests.name: Home Sample - Bone & Mineral Package
tests.description: Home sample collection for bone mineral profile including calcium, vitamin D and phosphorus.

tests.name: Home Sample - Liver Comprehensive Panel
tests.description: Comprehensive liver function panel collected at home for your convenience.

tests.name: Home Sample - Full Wellness Elite
tests.description: Elite home wellness package with extensive panels and home collection.

tests.name: Genetic Screening - BRCA 1/2 Mutation
tests.description: Genetic test to check for BRCA 1/2 mutations for breast/ovarian cancer risk.

tests.name: Thyroid Autoantibodies (TPO/Thyroglobulin)
tests.description: Autoimmune thyroid panel testing TPO and thyroglobulin antibodies.

tests.name: Tumour Marker - PSA
tests.description: Prostate-specific antigen test for prostate cancer screening.

tests.name: Tumour Marker - CA125
tests.description: CA125 marker test used in monitoring ovarian cancer and other conditions.

tests.name: HIV Viral Load Quantitative
tests.description: Measures HIV RNA copies in the blood for treatment monitoring.

tests.name: Drug Abuse Panel - 10 substances (Urine)
tests.description: Comprehensive screening of 10 common drugs in urine sample.

tests.name: Genetic - Cystic Fibrosis 8-Mutation Panel
tests.description: Genetic test screening 8 common mutations causing cystic fibrosis.

tests.name: Cardiac Biomarker - Troponin I (High sensitivity)
tests.description: Sensitive troponin I test for early detection of heart muscle damage.

tests.name: Allergy Panel - Food IgG (231 foods)
tests.description: Comprehensive food intolerance screening of 231 food items.

tests.name: 24-Hour Urine Cortisol
tests.description: Measures cortisol excretion over 24 hours to evaluate adrenal function.

tests.name: Bone Marrow Aspirate with Film
tests.description: Bone marrow aspirate and film for diagnosis of blood disorders.

tests.name: DNA Paternity Test
tests.description: DNA test to establish biological paternity relationship with high accuracy.

tests.name: Tumour Marker - CA 19-9
tests.description: Tumour marker test used primarily for pancreatic cancer monitoring.

tests.name: 24-Hour Urine Metanephrines
tests.description: Measures metanephrines in urine collected over 24 h for pheochromocytoma testing.

tests.name: PCR - Chlamydia / Gonorrhoea NAAT
tests.description: Nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT) for chlamydia and gonorrhoea.

tests.name: H. Pylori Stool Antigen
tests.description: Stool antigen test for H. Pylori infection detection.

tests.name: Malaria Rapid Antigen Test
tests.description: Rapid antigen test for malaria infection detection.

tests.name: Hepatitis B Surface Antigen (HBsAg)
tests.description: Screening test for hepatitis B infection.

tests.name: Pap Smear - Cervical Cytology
tests.description: Screening test for cervical cancer via exfoliative cytology.

tests.name: Vitamin B12 & Folate Panel
tests.description: Measures vitamin B12 and folate to assess nutritional and hematologic status.
